metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13716 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: The C++ symbol demangler routine in cplus-dem.c in libiberty, asdistributed in GNU Binutils 2.29, allows remote attackers to cause a denialof service (excessive memory allocation and application crash) via acrafted file, as demonstrated by a call from the Binary File Descriptor(BFD) library (aka libbfd).

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
